SEARCH
Package model

Class SpeciesController

java.lang.Object
model.SpeciesController
public class SpeciesController extends Object
Controller class for managing the species catalog. Handles all CRUD operations for both flora and fauna species.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SpeciesController()
    Creates a new species controller with an empty catalog.

  • Constructor Details

    • SpeciesController

      public SpeciesController()
      Creates a new species controller with an empty catalog. Initializes the species array with the maximum capacity.

  • Method Details

    • registerFlora

      public boolean registerFlora(String name, String scientificName, SpeciesType type, boolean hasFlowers, boolean hasFruits, double maxHeight)
      Registers a new flora species in the catalog.
      Parameters:
      name - The common name of the flora species
      scientificName - The scientific name in binomial nomenclature
      hasFlowers - Whether the plant produces flowers
      hasFruits - Whether the plant produces fruits
      maxHeight - The maximum height the plant can reach in meters
      Returns:
      true if the registration was successful, false if the catalog is full

    • registerFauna

      public boolean registerFauna(String name, String scientificName, SpeciesType type, boolean isMigratory, double maxWeight)
      Registers a new fauna species in the catalog.
      Parameters:
      name - The common name of the fauna species
      scientificName - The scientific name in binomial nomenclature
      isMigratory - Whether the animal is migratory
      maxWeight - The maximum weight the animal can reach in kilograms
      Returns:
      true if the registration was successful, false if the catalog is full

    • editSpecies

      public boolean editSpecies(int index, String name, String scientificName)
      Edits the basic information of an existing species.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the species to edit
      name - The new common name
      scientificName - The new scientific name
      Returns:
      true if the edit was successful, false if the index is invalid

    • deleteSpecies

      public boolean deleteSpecies(int index)
      Deletes a species from the catalog.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the species to delete
      Returns:
      true if the deletion was successful, false if the index is invalid

    • getSpeciesInfo

      public String getSpeciesInfo(int index)
      Gets detailed information about a specific species.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the species to get information about
      Returns:
      A formatted string with all species information, or an error message if the index is invalid

    • showSpeciesList

      public String showSpeciesList()
      Gets a list of all species in the catalog.
      Returns:
      A formatted string containing all species names with their indices, or an empty string if the catalog is empty

    • getSpeciesScientificName

      public String getSpeciesScientificName(int index)
      Gets the scientific name of a species at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the species
      Returns:
      The scientific name of the species, or null if the index is invalid

    • getSpeciesName

      public String getSpeciesName(int index)
      Gets the name of a species at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the species
      Returns:
      The name of the species, or null if the index is invalid
